body.name: GRACE KARIN Women's 2024 Satin Midi Dress Summer Cap Sleeve Cowl Neck Belted Slit Elegant A-Line Flowy Dress with Pockets
features: Size Attention: S=US 4-6, M=US 8-10, L=US 12-14, XL=US 16-18. This 2024 women satin dress is made of premium material, soft, lightweight, smooth, gentle and skin friendly, making it an absolute pleasure to wear.

Features: The elegant satin midi dress features cowl neck, cap sleeve, 2 pockets, matching belt, side slit and button closure. The flowy silhouette and the draped fabric of this bleted satin semi formal dress create an elegant and feminine look for you. Our summer sleeveless silky dresses for women modify your figure well, ideal for almost body shape.
Matching Style: GRACE KARIN's high waist satin cocktail party dress is easy to pair with heels, sandals, earrings, necklaces and handbags to create stylish, simple or gorgeous look.

Occasion: These satin wedding guest dresses for women are suitable for almost all occasions, casual, daily wear, vacation, office, cocktail, banquet, wedding, prom, evening, club, dating and formal party. They can be dressed up or down, depending on the occasion. With the right accessories and styling, the satin formal maxi dress can transition seamlessly from formal events to semi-formal gatherings.
Garment Care: Our silk night out dress is recommended to hand wash or gentle machine wash in cold water, do not bleach, hang to dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Just perfect. Smooth and silky. Barely any wrinkles, right out of the bag. Went up a size after reading about large breast pulling bodice up at waistline. So glad I did! Great fit! I am a 12-14, but I ordered XL. Beautiful black dress! I may order a second dress in a different color!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress but it needs sizing adjustments in the larger sizes.
reviews.reviewText: I was so looking forward to this dress and the sizing chart for the 2XL was spot on. That being said the models showing the dress have the waist line at the waist with the belt nicely draped. The dress has a cowl neck, a belt, two pockets, a skirt lining that hits mid thigh (18 1/2" from waist to hem), two side slits and a back button closure. The skirt flows beautifully and the lining allows the skirt fabric to skim your curves. The top of the dress, for me, does not fit well. The measurement is 16 1/2" from the shoulder seam to the elastic waist, I need 20 to 21" so the waist sits at an odd location. The waist is 47" fully stretched which would be great if it hit my waist. The cowl does not drape correctly to accomodate a bustier lady, it probably is using the same drape measurement for a smaller dress size. The Bustline measures 48" from armhole to armhole. The armholes are a full 20" around which are too large for most women and will show your foundation garments. The dress measures a full 55" from neck to bottom hem and there are two slits on either sides that measure 16" from bottom hem. The description mentions a high waist but the pictures of the dress on the model to not support that. I actually love the fit and flow of the skirt and I will get a new top and replace what is there now.

reviews.reviewerName: Lost in the CrowdLost in the Crowd
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a night on the town!
reviews.reviewText: Lovely dress, classic styling! Black is the perfect color for this midi dress (hangs to the calf).Was eager to try this item on for size and wear it out on a date with hubs! Sadly this was not to be as the dress has no stretch whatsoever (except for the waist band) and will not go over my bust area. Had I tried an XXL it would more than likely have fit but this is an XL. (For reference I am somewhere between a USA size 16 to 18 so I can usually wear either of those sizes.)That being said every inch of the stress is beautiful. The waistline and hemline are flattering. The drop neck styling on this dress is well proportioned and can be left as it lies or paired with a beautiful choker necklace....even pearls perhaps. Cap sleeves are also attractive. To be noted also is the hem slits on either side of the legs for room to move....even dance!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars rich and elegant
reviews.reviewText: Size 4 , size small worked well. For 5 foot 1 inches, hits at ankle length. The color is a pretty blushy pink. It is a silk satin thick material, no additional liner needed. No stretch to the material due to the satin material in nature. No significant wrinkles on arrival. Looks rich and expensive and elegant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not flattering for Plus Size
reviews.reviewText: This dress is not made for anyone that has curves or a hourglass figure. The material is very thin and you can see everything (even with spanxx on). The neck is odd to, I feel like it should be bigger and more off the shoulder to be flattering, but once you button it, it's odd looking. The slip is also a bugger to get right and I wore it around the house before even realizing that there was a built in slip.If you are petite, I think it would work but for fuller women, its a no go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: First off this dress is soft and the color is exactly as pictured. Unfortunately the top runs extremely short waisted and the fabric is not cut generous enough for the neckline to hang as a cowl neckline. I would say it is well made, but the cut of the top half is very off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Material wrinkles easily
reviews.reviewText: This dress is really pretty and the light blue color is perfect. I have a few clothing items from Grace Karin and honestly have never been disappointed, especially at the reasonable price point. This dress has a comfortable lining that goes to mid thigh and allows the satin material to lay nicely. It is lightweight and perfect for warm days. I am deducting one star because it wrinkles easily and the delicate wash/dry maintenance. It definitely needs to be ironed but I would do so cautiously on a low heat and inside out. The other issue for me is the elastic waistband hits me in a weird place. It hits slightly above my natural waistline. I am long waisted so that is not uncommon but worth mentioning. Overall it is a nice versatile dress.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Elegant and stylish
reviews.reviewText: This is a really nice dress. Nice quality, fits well, looks great. Perfect for a dressy occasion.
